content.question: When did you get married?
content.useTheDate: Use the date on your marriage certificate
content.facts: Later in this application, you’ll be asked to choose a reason for the breakdown of your marriage from a list of 5 options.
content.options: You won’t be shown the following options if you haven't been married for long enough to use them.
content.separated2YearsDescription: Your {{ divorceWho }} agrees to a divorce and you've been separated for 2 years or more
content.separated5YearsDescription: You've been separated from your {{ divorceWho }} for 5 years or more
content.desertionDescription: Your {{ divorceWho }} abandoned you (left without your agreement) more than 2 years ago
content.stillCanUse: You'll be able to select behaviour and adultery, as long as you've been married for more than a year.
